# statusUpdates

**Instance Property**

An asynchronous sequence of download-status updates for all asset packs.

## Declaration

```swift
final let statusUpdates: some Sendable & AsyncSequence<AssetPackManager.DownloadStatusUpdate, Never>
```

## Discussion

The sequence never finishes.

## Tracking downloads

- **statusUpdates(forAssetPackWithID:)**: Gets an asynchronous sequence of download-status updates for the asset pack with the specified ID.
- **AssetPackManager.DownloadStatusUpdate**: Statuses of an asset-pack download.
- **status(ofAssetPackWithID:)**: Returns an asynchronous sequence of download-status updates for the specified asset pack.
